title: The Quiet Music of Gently Falling Snow
description: The words of this book tell only a small part of what can be found in the images; a harbour in which to rest, a catalyst for the imagination.‚Äù Jackie MorrisA collection of twelve illustrated folk tales, or lullabies for grown-ups, set in a distant world of music, snow and magic. The stories are based around a series of musically-themed illustrations first created by Jackie for Help Musicians UK.Foreword by Jon Boden.
author: Jackie Morris
